title: Lifelike
description: Ewan, my dead sister's son, took under a week to wrench my life apart. Some advice - never sign contracts hungover. He stole my bedroom; that was the beginning. Lord help me, it took an 11 year old to make me grow up. Slow slash, no incest or kid fiddlingStatus: In progress/IncompleteLast update: 6/7/2010Word count: approx. 65,598
author: Zebbie
